name: Ordered Items To Be Delivered
query:
select 
 `tabSales Order`.`name` as "Sales Order:Link/Sales Order:120",
 CONCAT('<button style="background-color:#318AD8; color:#ffffff; margin:10px,10px,5px,5px; border-radius: 9px; text-decoration: none; height:22px; width:70px; border: none; text-align: center;" type=''button'' data=''', `tabSales Order`.name ,''' onClick=''close_so(this.getAttribute("data"))''>Close</button>&nbsp<button style="background-color:#154c79 ; color:#ffffff ; margin-left:10px; border-radius: 9px; text-decoration: none; height:22px; width:70px; border: none; text-align: center;" type="button" data=''', `tabSales Order`.name ,''' onClick=''dispatch(this.getAttribute("data"))''>Dispatch</button>') as "Close SO / Dispatch:Data:170",
 `tabSales Order`.`po_no` as "Customer Po No:200",
 `tabSales Order`.`po_date` as "Customer Po Date:Date",
 `tabSales Order`.`customer` as "Customer:Link/Customer:120",
 `tabSales Order`.`transaction_date` as "Date:Date",
 `tabSales Order Item`.item_code as "Item:Link/Item:120",
 `tabSales Order Item`.description as "Description::200",
 `tabSales Order Item`.qty as "Qty:Float:140",
 `tabSales Order Item`.delivered_qty as "Delivered Qty:Float:140", 
(`tabSales Order Item`.qty - ifnull(`tabSales Order Item`.delivered_qty, 0)) as "Qty to Deliver:Float:140",
 `tabSales Order Item`.base_rate as "Rate:Float:140",
 `tabSales Order Item`.amount as "Amount:Float:140",
 (select SUM(`tabBin`.actual_qty) from tabBin WHERE tabBin.warehouse in (select name from tabWarehouse WHERE tabWarehouse.parent_warehouse = "WAGHOLI BIN RACK - DBTPL") and tabBin.item_code = `tabSales Order Item`.item_code) as "Wagholi Stock:Float:140",
 (select SUM(`tabBin`.actual_qty) from tabBin WHERE tabBin.warehouse = "Pune - DBTPL" and tabBin.item_code = `tabSales Order Item`.item_code) as "Pune Stock:Float:140",
 (select SUM(`tabBin`.actual_qty) from tabBin WHERE tabBin.warehouse in (select name from tabWarehouse WHERE tabWarehouse.parent_warehouse = "PIMPRI BIN RACK - DBTPL") and tabBin.item_code = `tabSales Order Item`.item_code) as "Pimpri Stock:Float:140",
 (select SUM(`tabBin`.actual_qty) from tabBin WHERE tabBin.warehouse in (select name from tabWarehouse WHERE tabWarehouse.parent_warehouse = "MAHAPE BIN RACK - DBTPL") and tabBin.item_code = `tabSales Order Item`.item_code) as "Mahape Stock:Float:140",
 `tabSales Order Item`.item_group as "Item Group:Link/Item Group:120"
 from `tabSales Order` 
 JOIN `tabSales Order Item` on `tabSales Order Item`.`parent` = `tabSales Order`.`name` 
 JOIN `tabCustomer` on `tabCustomer`.`name` = `tabSales Order`.`customer`
 WHERE  `tabSales Order`.docstatus = 1  and `tabSales Order`.status not in ("Stopped", "Closed") and ifnull(`tabSales Order Item`.delivered_qty,0) < ifnull(`tabSales Order Item`.qty,0)
 order by `tabSales Order`.transaction_date asc
